

    Original NES Game Genie codes created by:

       Tony Hedstrom   t_hedstrom@yahoo.com


   Attack of the Killer Tomatoes

PAUAUYLE  start with 9 lives (instead of 3)

YAUAUYLE  start with 15 lives

PPUAUYLE  start with 25 lives

ZLUAUYLA  start with 50 lives



=====
Tony Hedstrom
